alert.note: Alert for Atascosa; Bexar; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 1:24AM CDT until April 21 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Karnes County in south central Texas... Central Atascosa County in south central Texas... Wilson County in south central Texas... Southeastern Bexar County in south central Texas... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Zuehl to 8 miles west of Poteet, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Pleasanton, Floresville, Jourdanton, Poteet, Poth, Stockdale, Campbellton, Kosciusko, Nixon, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia, China Grove, Falls City, Pandora, Calaveras Lake, Gillett and Cestohowa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
